data.title: 2025 Large Online Programs in Georgia
data.meta_description: Ranking of the best large online programs in Georgia. Compare colleges with the best online degree programs.

South University - Savannah

Blue checkmark.

4 Year ,

SAVANNAH, GA ,

820 Niche users give it an average review of 4.1 stars.

Featured Review: Freshman says If you're asking about how to answer an interview question about change, here are some tips: Provide a specific example: Use an example from your past that shows your problem-solving skills and initiative. Use positive language: Try to use positive language instead of negative, like "challenge" instead of "problem". Partner criticism with praise: Discuss aspects of a job you want to change in a positive light by emphasizing that your opinions are specific to you. Explain your actions: Describe the actions you took to make the change and how you adapted to the new situation. Share the outcome: Share the result or outcome of your efforts and the lessons you learned from the experience. Emphasize your adaptability: Explain how the change helped you grow and develop professionally. Avoid complaining: Don't complain or blame others for the change. .

Read 820 reviews.

Net Price : $21,449 ,
